entry.title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour

media:group.media:title: Who is Suppressing the Truth | 3ABN Worship Hour
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Are you suppressing the Seventh-day Adventist truth? The Bible says to whom much is given much is required. Don't cover up the straight testimony of truth so preciously revealed to you by God otherwise you. We have far more to fear from within than from without. The hindrance to strength and success are far greater from the church itself than from the world. Join Pastor Kenny Shelton as he opens the Bible to teach us about Seventh-day Adventist revival and reformation.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

media:group.media:title: “REACH International“ - 3ABN Today (TDY190062)
media:group.media:description:
From a small beginning in 1973, REACH has expanded into 21 countries with 5 branch offices. Each year, in REACH-sponsored schools, orphanages, and hostels, nearly 20,000 children receive an education, live in safety and security, eat three meals a day, and learn the values of faith, charity and service. Join JD & SHelley Quinn for this inspiring story faith told by their guests Jasmin Jacob & Lois Prestand.
Learn more here: http://reach.org/

This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Ministering Like Jesus” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(August 15 - August 21, 2020)

Memory Text: “But when He saw the multitudes, He was moved with compassion for them, because they were weary and scattered, like sheep having no shepherd” (Matthew 9:36, NKJV).

media:group.media:title: Antichrist | The Undeniable Identity (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Who is the Antichrist? Many Christians think it was Nero. Some think it's President Donald Trump or even Bill Gates. The Bible gives us all the identifying characteristics so that we can know for sure. The truth is, scripture reveals that the Antichrist would come from within the church. It calls the Antichrist the "son of perdition" just like Judas was called. A parallel that can't be missed. The Antichrist is a deceiver that seeks to take the place of God as written about in 2 Thessalonians 2:4 says. Does the world have a counterfeit Jesus? One who blasphemy's God and fulfills the prophecies of the Bible? Join us for this episode of 3ABN Worship Hour, a sermon time where we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Seventh-day Adventist Pastor, Ryan Day.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
Bible characteristics of Antichrist: 1) Small Kingdom 2) Comes up among the 10 divisions of Rome 3) Rises after 476 AD 4) Destroys three kingdoms 5) A man or face at it's head (leader) 6) Speaks blasphemy 7) Persecutes the saints 8) Thinks to change God's law 9) Rules for 1260 years 10) Dominant world power 11) Wears red and purple 12) Headquarters on 7 mountains 13) Has a special relationship with the leaders of the world
Related video- “Revelation’s Mark of the Beast Exposed” | 22 - Revelation's Ancient Discoveries https://youtu.be/lvTL_lnN5-Q
Related Playlist- Revelation's Ancient Discoveries https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeFIDisZ08E2MVJglak-Mn5oDsyN-6jRO

media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 7 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Sharing the Word.” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(August 8 - August 14, 2020)
Reading: Ps. 119:105, Jer. 23:29, Heb. 1:1–3, 2 Tim. 3:14–17, 1 John 1:7–9, Eccles. 3:1, 2 Tim. 4:2
Memory Text: “ ‘So shall My word be that goes forth from My mouth; it shall not return to Me void, but it shall accomplish what I please, and it shall prosper in the thing for which I sent it’ ” (Isaiah 55:11, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) “Symbols of God’s Word” Monday (Jill Morikone) “The Creative Power of God’s Word” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) “The Benefits of Studying God’s Word” Wednesday (John Lomacang) “Applying God’s Word” Thursday (Danny Shelton) “Sharing the Word”

media:group.media:title: Darkness on Earth (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Christians don't have to fear when there is turmoil and darkness all around. Even though Satan is trying to lead you astray, God will make a way for you to escape your tribulation.
The walk of a Christian ought to be like Jesus walked. A live of self denial. The Bible says we should take up our cross daily. That is to say, we should humble ourselves just as Jesus did on Calvary. Maybe you've never done this before. Maybe you struggle with self denial. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
